mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comm (cboard_no, cboard_title, cboard_content, cboard_viewcnt, cboard_date, user_no, cboard_delete_chk, comm_big, comm_mid, comm_big2, comm_mid2, comm_update_date) VALUES (SEQ_BOARDFREE_NO.nextval, #{cboard_title}, #{cboard_content}, 0, sysdate, #{user_no}, 0, 300, 20, 0, 0, sysdate)
